title: How to get a BTS album - Quora

response.answer_text: You can go to Target! They are always there but sometimes they only have specific versions,like for instance I wanted to get Persona version 3 but there wasn’t version 3 so I had to get another one. (NOT COMPLAINING THO IT WAS BETTER THE I THOUGHT) anyways you can also get it from amazon too. I havent done that but I planned on getting mots 7 at target with a gift card I have but bgefore I knew it I couldnt :/ now I’m probably gonna get it on amazon. (luckily the gift card has no expiration i could use it in 2050) anyways I hope I answered your question :) From the stars, ARMYYYY <3
